#Name: Command - Devicetype - Generate Random Address for Device Type
Enable-Disable / 0 = disabled 1 = enabled / [0] = pir - [1] button - [2] lux - [3] temp
Desk in use parameters: time window 1 [s]   (default = 5s)
Desk in use parameters: time window 2 [s]   (default = 10s)
PIR filtered: PIR motion with holding time
Button Events (Master has to reset Event. Event init pressed will only be set if during whole time brightness sensor is darkened down)
Brightness calibrated filtered 0 - 5000 [Lux/10] (0xFFFF = value not valid)
Set Flag after (Time button t-init - 3s) and LUX < 30
Error Sensormodule / bit [0]: Error PIR - bit[1]: Error BUTTON - bit[2]: Error Brightness - bit[3]: Error Temp
Calibrating factor brightness [Lux] (will be set to default 125/250 in software)
Max Brightness value (will be set to default 5000/10000 in software)
Temperatur ex. Temp sensor (0xFFFF = value not valid)
Device states - 1 = factory reset (all param. Def.) 2 = Reset 6 = FastReset 8 = Manufacturer Reset (all param. Def. Exept. Calibration data)
Device error states (LowByte: Number of occured watchdog (0-255) HighByte: none)
Raw signal PIR: 0 = detection - 1 = no detection
Button states - 0 = not pressed  1 = pressed (manufacturing test)
